t: Amazon Excess Inventory: Risks & Strategies to Reduce It
s: November 17, 2024 - Excess inventory is a common problem for any retail business, but when it comes to Amazon sellers, the challenges are even more complex and expensive. Amazon’s storage fees, strict performance metrics, and the fast-paced nature of the marketplace make excess inventory particularly costly.
